alert.note: Alert for Kern (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 21 at 3:17PM PDT until August 21 at 3:45PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hanford CA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Kern County in central California... * Until 345 PM PDT. * At 316 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles northwest of McKittrick, or 36 miles southwest of Delano, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of western Kern County. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail accumulation is possible.
